imgDesc.text:
...Creates a heavily armored shield capable of releasing shockwaves that can shatter stones.
<color=#ffe14b>Holding it down</color> will continuously expand the shield, and when you <color=#ffe14b>release</color> the skill, this will release a shockwave in the direction you are aiming. If you are attacked during this time, it will unleash an even stronger energy bolt.
